extendedInfo.description: A game of skill and mental ability for all ages, where it is important to think fast and focus our attention.How to play?The game involves chaining pieces with other pieces. Two pieces can be chained if they have the same shape or the same color.There is a maximum time to play the next piece.Link Up has several game modes, each with its initial difficulty. Each mode consists of several levels with increasing difficulty, to be completed according to the objective enabling the previous level.Ranking:There is a list of the best times for each game mode. In modes Easy, Intermediate, Advanced and Ghost you get time to upload to Ranking when you complete all game levels. Total time is the sum of every level time. In Survive and To The Limit modes times can be uploaded from the first result.You can replay any level to get a better time and improve total time.Available in spanish as EncadenaIf you want to help translate Link Up to your language, contact the author: cerezosoft@gmail.comKey words: simple, child, mental trainer, free, funny.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: If there had been an option to switch off the timer, the game would have been usable for toddlers.
reviews.author: Emma L.

reviews.title: Awesome game.
reviews.comment: It\'s better if there\'s children mode. No timer
reviews.author: S\306\241n Tr\341\272\247n Quang

reviews.title: Funny and challenging
reviews.comment: This game is a challenge for your attention. When I sart one level I can\'t stop until I finish it
reviews.author: Daniel Tosta
